name: Pathogen-X
storyline: The virus known as Pathogen-X has broken out within the Delta Corp research facility without warning, infecting and producing droves of violent mutants. As special forces agent Hawk, you've been tasked with a quick search-and-retrieval mission. Infiltrate the lab, find a vaccine, and get out before the place is nuked.
summary: Pathogen-X is a return to the classic survival horror genre, inspired by games from the late 90's such as Dino Crisis, Resident Evil, and Deep Fear. Can you brave your way through the terrors of the Delta Corp Labs?

videos.name: Demo Playthrough
videos.title: Pathogen-X (Demo Playthough) Survival horror inspired by the Resident Evil and Dino Crisis series!
